html:
3.14.22  2:57 am   as a non binary person changing my name I have a concerningly strong urge to rename myself damien maymdien do you have alternatives

      there's gotta be some names in the graveyard video from near halloween 2015

3.14.22  2:40 am   make a song about yourslef

      that sounds like something i would do

3.14.22  2:37 am   how many darn years has 2 + 2 been 4 for

      just enough

3.14.22  12:51 am   Hii!! Your music (and videos) have helped me go through a lot of tough times and I was really curious if you ever planned on making a full length album as it would probably be the best day of my life if you do!! 

      it would probably be impossible for me to make a good album, because i don't like albums. it would be like trying to make a great cheesecake when i don't like cheesecake. i'd simply have no way of knowing if it's good, because i don't have a taste for it

3.13.22  11:49 pm   How do I described your music and video styling to someone who's never heard/seen you before?

      not necessary

3.13.22  10:54 pm   oh my gosh . why is music so complicated

     you may be in a complicated mood

     or is it not ?

     i'm not sure

      am i complicated or is music

      if the mood strikes

3.13.22  9:53 pm   How many words are in the title of the next song?

      none

3.13.22  9:12 pm   What's a medium you've been meaning to get into, but you haven't yet because of time constraints/it seems very overwhelming? (Like, writing, painting, live action vids, really anything artistic)

      cosmological breakthroughs,

3.13.22  7:45 pm   when is the next non-song video?

      i'm not sure. could be any time

3.13.22  6:58 pm   can i fluctuate

     yes, i'm sure

     can you fluctuate

      yes

3.13.22  5:10 pm   Will you ever make a song about the ocean, or name a song after the ocean?

      i have what sounds like the chorus of an ocean song, but it's in the context of a non-song video. it might be just a segment in that video. other than that, i'm currently trying to hold back from putting "ocean" in my songs because it feels like i've done it too much

3.13.22  5:01 pm   I couldn't think of a good question but I really wanted to type something in this box.

      i can understand that

3.13.22  2:27 pm   which song writing technique do you use mostly?

     beginning to end

      do you find melody first then write lyrics to it

     rarely

      or write lyrics first and then conform melody to them?

     rarely

      you have a reality video of "and the day goes on" and you play/sing melody while recording yourself on camera. assuming it had no lyrics at the time, you probably wrote lyrics later on. but is it how you always make your music?

     it's always best when the lyrics+melody are born at the exact same time. that's where the truest and strongest results come in. but, with practice, it can be done separately if for some reason you got only 1 first

3.13.22  1:33 pm   is your next song about trains?

      no

3.13.22  1:30 pm   For the enharmonic keys, which names do you use?

      which ever one would have the least sharps/flats in the key signature. for example, i'd call it the key of C# minor, but the key of Db major. if it switches between the 2, then it's all fucked so whatever

3.13.22  1:14 pm   Seems like the word "strong" is used a lot in your content, but when it's used it's usually used in an ... unconventional way. Do you mind talking about your 'opinion' of the word?

      i like and enjoy that word. therefore i risk using it too much. i've added a special department to monitor the usage of these favorite words, to try to keep it from getting out of control, and to encourage me to find different words to enjoy

3.13.22  12:57 pm   who owns money?

      perhaps you can

3.13.22  11:52 am   are you the chief justice of climate change court?

     no

     if not, would you want to be?

     no

3.13.22  8:09 am   is 1:18 to 1:25 in 'here comes the sun' a reference to 'hi, i'm steve'?

      no. that part was written 5 years before 'hi, i'm steve'

3.13.22  6:32 am   how much daylight are you personally saving this daylight savings?

      none. it's just relocated to the other end of the day

3.13.22  3:38 am   top 5 cheese types

      corn cheese, that's the only type i know

3.13.22  12:12 am   how to know if I am being too direct according to the general unspoken social rules 

      there is a watch app that gives you an electric shock every time you break social rules

3.12.22  11:56 pm   How do I become clever?

      no one knows. only you know this

3.12.22  11:55 pm   how do you even?

      impossible. it can't be done

3.12.22  8:14 pm   Can I make a song that's clearly in 4/4 but I just notate it as 3/4 in the sheet music?  

     sure

     Or does that violate some rule of music/theory?

      there never was any rules

3.12.22  7:20 pm   what the fuck is the 'yankee doodle' song about?

      selling a cow?

3.12.22  6:47 pm   What do you think I was in my past life?

      you've been everything before

3.12.22  6:18 pm   Why do you use capital letters?

      it calms me down

3.12.22  4:35 pm   is the next song about normalcy

      i'll admit it's about an adjacent subject

3.12.22  4:29 pm   Where did you get the knight's helmet from the video to when i get older?

      at the corner store. just kidding, it was a store in the middle of the block

3.12.22  3:53 pm   is "fly around" a prequel and/or sequel to "at the airport terminal"?

     no

     also thanks a lot bill, I can't go to an airport terminal anymore without that song getting stuck in my head

      you're welcome

3.12.22  3:38 pm   who makes the roads

      you might have to do it

3.12.22  1:58 pm   what's the unrelated object of the day, bill?

      don't worry about it. everything is related

3.12.22  12:16 pm   what is your favourite thing about writing songs?

      can make magic happen

3.12.22  11:41 am   Can I be in your next song

      sure

3.12.22  11:14 am   Where did you get the idea for 'snail time'?

      somewhere where there weren't any snails. that much i'm sure of

3.12.22  10:11 am   are there colors that we can't see?

      yes

3.12.22  9:47 am   Why is the more than a dream thumbnail a bunch of cheerios?

      it's circles, but i have a follow up question: why is cheerios a bunch of circles

3.12.22  9:42 am   have you ever tackled the theme of domestic abuse in your work?

      i was going to say no but then i remembered 'ball and stick'

3.12.22  9:36 am   in "fly around" at 1' 28'', why is having your blanket with you allegedly keeping you from flying around, and why would you fly around when tired when it is presumably an action that would require effort hence tiring you even more

      ah, you've found the 'reverse psychology' part of the song. this is to encourage critical thinking

3.12.22  8:48 am   What is Steve's last name?

      not steve. actually, now that i think about it, it might be steve

3.12.22  6:31 am   opinion on jigsaw puzzles 

      they're legally required to fit

3.12.22  5:20 am   thoughts on nothing?

      resembles everything

3.12.22  4:46 am   I suffer from a mental psychosis disorder and your music has helped me get though really bad episodes. Is writing music a relief for you or more of a job? 

      it's like a 'calling' or 'purpose in life', but it's like a 50x dose which most of the time just knocks me flat on my ass

3.12.22  4:19 am   First off, I just wanted to say that your songs have helped me a lot recently with my anxiety. Whenever I'm having really high anxiety, I listen to "I'm Scared" to remind myself that I'm not alone and I'm not going crazy, and then after that I listen to "Fly Around" because your voice in that song is so soothing and the song in general has a really nice feel to it and it calms me down and sometimes even helps me fall asleep at night.

     holy smokes, is this some kind of kindness delivery service going on here

      Now for the obligatory question: What helps you when you're anxious? 

      tap yourself about an inch below/left of your left collar bone and calmly explain to yourself what the flipping heck is going on

3.12.22  12:58 am   controversial opinions on green eggs and ham by dr seuss?

      "it's good", "it sucks",

3.12.22  12:11 am   Is it possible to make something that is truly random?

      no

3.11.22  11:37 pm   is 0:22 to 0:24 of "got some money" related to/based off of 2:17 to 2:23 of "here comes the sun"

      no

3.11.22  11:32 pm   hey im really new at composing, how do I stop making melodies over the same four chords

      what are the words doing? try to imagine the scene in a different location than you've tried before. this should steer you in the right direction, including any chords you may/maynot need for it

3.11.22  11:19 pm   opinion on string dampeners

      dank
